summary: Completed comprehensive testing of CodeTrackr application. All core features are working correctly including user authentication, dashboard functionality, problem management, and data visualization.

minor_issues.issue: Returns 403 instead of 401 for unauthorized access
minor_issues.impact: Minor - both status codes indicate unauthorized access correctly

minor_issues.issue: Accepts empty title and empty topics in problem creation
minor_issues.impact: Low - validation could be stricter but doesn't break functionality

design_issues.issue: shadcn/ui Select components require specific selectors for automation testing

passed_tests: User Registration - Create new account with username and password
User Login - Login with existing credentials and receive JWT token
Dashboard Access - Protected route redirects to login if not authenticated
Empty State - Show empty state with 'Add Problem' and 'Load Sample Data' buttons
Seed Sample Data - Load 10 sample problems successfully
Dashboard Stats Display - Show total solved count, current streak, and topics covered
Topic-wise Progress Chart - Display bar chart with topic-wise problem count using Recharts
Completion Percentage - Display topic-wise completion percentages
Recent Problems Table - Show list of problems with title, platform, difficulty, topics, and date
Add Problem Page - Navigate to add problem form successfully
Add New Problem - Fill form and submit new problem
Problem Creation - New problem appears in dashboard after creation
Logout - Logout functionality clears token and redirects to login
Navigation - All navigation buttons work correctly
Protected Routes - Unauthorized access properly redirected to login
